<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific scalartax account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
